QuestData.Title: Defending the Rift
QuestData.Description: The whispers of the elements are crowding my thoughts, $n...$b$bThe Throne of Tides is under siege!$b$bI cannot stand idly by while the naga threaten Neptulon's realm. We must find a way to join forces with him.$b$bNazgrim will escort me to the depths where I can commune directly with Neptulon.$b$bI must ask you to take a more violent path. Keep the enemy forces distracted until I arrive safely at entrance to the Throne of Tides.$b$bMay the spirits see us through, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any 15 naga in the Abyssal Breach.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh, there you are. Erunak has gone ahead to speak with Neptulon. We must hurry!

Objectives.Objective: Kill 15 naga in the Abyssal Breach
